entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: TimeOnly arithmetic is translated incorrectly #35311
  • Cosmos: DateTimeOffset with non-zero offsets are not supported by functions #35310
  • EF Core 9: when altering views in migrationbuilder.Sql(), script-migration now creates multiple statements in the batch #35309
  • EF Core 9: HierarchyId extension registration API is missing for Azure SQL #35307
  • Unable to cast and similar exceptions should include property and entity name when feasible. #35306
  • Issues with EF Core 8 Model Compilation #35305
  • Issue with EFScaffoldModelStage and entity named Module #35304

Closed

  • EF9 InMemory database causes InvalidOperationException when calling RelationalTypeBaseExtensions.GetTableMappings() #35220
  • EF Core error when inserting new records with multiple relation with another entity. #35302
  • Scaffolding with required modifier for nullable enabled projects #35291
  • When reporting PendingModelChangesWarning, look into including information on the model discrepancy #35292
  • Temporal table migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35108
    9.0.2
  • Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35281
    10.0.0
  • Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') issue on Concurrent/Duplicate updates #35185
  • Regression in EF9 for CosmosDb, 'CountAsync' broken #35245
  • Issues with EF Tools (9.0.0) and MS.CodeAnalysis.WorkSpaces.MSBuild (4.8.0) #35258
  • Improvements on development migrations (command to apply schema without generating migration files) #35296

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BenchmarkDotNet #35312
  • Interpretation testing #35308

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35108 - Temporal table migration regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35289
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.2
  • [TINY] Fix to #35281 - Migrations: CreateTableBuilder<TColumns> Annotation(string name, object value) should accept object? instead #35297
